alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Tipton, southeastern Lauderdale and Haywood Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Covington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Covington, Brighton, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Henning, Burlison, Garland, Allens, Christmasville, Jones, Shepp, Turnpike, Rialto, Cotton Lake, Orysa, Bride, Rudolph and Tibbs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
